summary: The module parses the XML metadata returned by the MaStR SOAP webservice, extracts field definitions and their data types, applies filtering and type conversion logic, and assembles a structured, ordered description of the dataset schema for downstream documentation generation.
business_intent: To give developers and data engineers a reliable way to programmatically obtain and document the structure of openâ€‘MaStR datasets, facilitating data integration, validation, and the creation of clear schema documentation for regulatory and analytical purposes.
